snippet: Prosecutors rested their case Tuesday in the trial of a Marine veteran charged with killing the “American Sniper” author Chris Kyle and another man.
abstract: Texas prosecutors rest their case in trial of Eddie Ray Routh, Marine veteran accused of killing American Sniper author Chris Kyle and Kyle's friend Chad Littlefield.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors rested their case Tuesday in the trial of a Marine veteran charged with killing the “American Sniper” author Chris Kyle and another man.

headline.main: Texas: Prosecutors in Sniper’s Death Rest
headline.print_headline: Texas: Prosecutors in Sniper’s Death Rest
